name: AVCoordinatedPlaybackParticipant
desc: An object that represents a participant in a coordinated playback session.

items.name: var identifier: UUID
items.desc: A unique identifier for the participant.

items.name: var isReadyToPlay: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the participant is ready to start coordinated playback.
